lines.line: The battle for Fallujah began at dawn, as our forces entered the war-torn streets.
Command had briefed us thoroughly on the high-stakes operation ahead.
Our squad moved tactically through the urban maze, weapons ready.
Suddenly, enemy fire erupted from a building to our right.
We pushed forward, advancing through the streets under heavy fire.
Our marksman took position, neutralizing threats from the upper floors.
The team breached a hostile building, clearing rooms with precision.
We located hostages and secured their extraction route.
Night fell as we continued operations under night vision.
When a teammate went down, we didn't hesitate.
By morning, with the city secured, we honored those who didn't make it back.

parsed_script.full_script: The battle for Fallujah began at dawn, as our forces entered the war-torn streets. Command had briefed us thoroughly on the high-stakes operation ahead. Our squad moved tactically through the urban maze, weapons ready. Suddenly, enemy fire erupted from a building to our right. We pushed forward, advancing through the streets under heavy fire. Our marksman took position, neutralizing threats from the upper floors. The team breached a hostile building, clearing rooms with precision. We located hostages and secured their extraction route. Night fell as we continued operations under night vision. When a teammate went down, we didn't hesitate. By morning, with the city secured, we honored those who didn't make it back.
